display.name: Slay Drakon and obtain the shard of wrath.

display.title: Shardbearer: Drakon
display.description:
"I have found two fitting individuals to bear keys to the abyssal seas. Two more remain. My old friend Varkon seems to have created a new life form; flying, infernal beasts. Imbecile. Their form is crude and their minds are fueled off of anger and malice. But I must thank him, a mindless creature is a perfect vessel for another shardbearer, and I think I know just the place. Dol'Naer was once a beacon reaching to the stars in days long since past, and now it shall be the birthplace of my dynasty. Welcome, Drakon, bearer of the shard of wrath."

- Eternal Tyrant of Shadow
